content: **knitted pants for children in drops merino extra fine worked top down size 12 month - 10 years** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-066-bn yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 - 5/6 - 7/8 - 9/10 years size equals approx kid s height in cm 80/86 92 - 98/104 - 110/116 - 122/128 - 134/140 **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200 250-250-250-300-300 g colour 41 olive **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm for stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
